import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { form:any ={ name:' ', data:{} } isLogin(){ let check = localStorage.getItem('name'); if(check != "null" && check != null){ this.form.data.name= localStorage.getItem('name'); } } }
